title:
Shark Tank Judge Anupam Mittal Says Google And Apple Are The New 'East 
India Company' - Here's why
text: Theme Technology & Science Gaming How To Cybersecurity Explainers AI FinTech EdTech Health Tech Travel Tech Gaming How To Cybersecurity Explainers AI FinTech EdTech Health Tech Travel Tech Trending: news technology science Updated Feb 19, 2024, 01:18 PM IST Anupam Mittal, the founder of Shaadi.com and a judge on Shark Tank India, recently compared two US-based tech giants Apple and Google to the East India Company.
